com.antlersoft.android.drawing

类 RectList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.antlersoft.android.drawing.RectList

  • public class RectList
extends java.lang.Object
    A list of rectangular regions that together represent an area of interest. Provides a set of operations that apply to the whole area, adding, changing and mutating the rectangles in the list as required.

    Invariants: None of the rectangles in the list overlap; no pair of rectangles in the list together make a single rectangle (none share a complete side)

    Instances of this class are not thread safe

    作者:
    Michael A. MacDonald

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RectList(ObjectPool<Rect> pool) 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void add(Rect toAdd)
      Add a rectangle to the region of interest
      void clear()
      Remove all rectangles from the list and release them from the pool
      Rect get(int i) 
      int getSize() 
      void intersect(Rect bounds)
      Change the rectangle of interest to include only those portions that fall inside bounds.
      void subtract(Rect toSubtract)
      Remove the rectangle from the area of interest.
      boolean testIntersect(Rect r)
      Determines if a rectangle intersects any part of the area of interest
      java.lang.String toString()
